traits.name: Disciplined
traits.text: The NPC has advantage on initiative rolls in the first round of combat.

traits.name: Shield Training
traits.text: While holding a shield, the NPC gains a +1 bonus to AC.

traits.name: Thick Hide
traits.text: The NPC has resistance to bludgeoning damage from nonmagical attacks.

traits.name: Relentless
traits.text: The first time the NPC would drop to 0 hit points, it drops to 1 hit point instead.

traits.name: Cunning
traits.text: The NPC can take the Disengage action as a bonus action.

traits.name: Evasive
traits.text: The NPC has advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects it can see.

traits.name: Blessed
traits.text: The NPC and allies within 10 ft. gain a +1 bonus to saving throws.

traits.name: Divine Ward
traits.text: The NPC gains temporary hit points equal to its proficiency bonus at the start of combat.

traits.name: Arcane Focus
traits.text: The NPC adds its proficiency bonus to damage from spell attacks.

traits.name: Mystic Veil
traits.text: The NPC has advantage on saving throws against being charmed.

traits.name: Steady
traits.text: The NPC has advantage on saving throws against being frightened.
